name: Viro tvornica secera d.d.
memberOrga:
Viro tvornica secera d.d.
Sladorana tvornica secera d.o.o.
goal: Viro tvornica secera d.d. (hereinafter: VIRO) is approved sugar producer on the EU market. The main goals are related to sustainable production of sugar and by-products, to create economic value, profit to shareholders, satisfy consumer needs and contribute to local communities.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumers, Trade
euInitiatives: Common Agricultural Policy of the EU in particular CMO Regulation of the Council and EP 1308/2013 about organization of market of agricultural products.
